title: Samsung Galaxy S22 Review: Good choice for most people, but not revolutionary
content:
Samsung finally revealed the Galaxy S22 series in February, with three models to choose from: the regular Galaxy S22, the Galaxy S22 Plus, and the Galaxy S22 Ultra. Most of the attention has been on the Galaxy S22 Ultra, mostly because it’s another Note-style phone and it has been a year and a half since

The post Samsung Galaxy S22 Review: Good choice for most people, but not revolutionary appeared first on xda-developers.
description: The base model Samsung Galaxy S22 isn't quite as exciting as the S22 Ultra, but it's still one of the best Android phones around right now.
